mapper.select: SELECT FROM st_hero ORDER BY ${column} desc LIMIT 1

(SELECT FROM st_hero b ORDER BY attack desc LIMIT 1 )UNION (SELECT FROM st_hero b ORDER BY ruse desc LIMIT 1 )UNION (SELECT FROM st_hero b ORDER BY distance desc LIMIT 1) UNION (SELECT FROM st_hero b ORDER BY speed desc LIMIT 1 ) UNION (SELECT FROM st_hero b ORDER BY siege desc LIMIT 1 ) UNION (SELECT FROM st_hero b ORDER BY def desc LIMIT 1 )

SELECT FROM st_hero WHERE 1 = 1
AND NAME LIKE concat('%',#{hero.name},'%')
select b.* from st_contrast a,st_hero b where userid = #{userid} and status = 1 and heroid = b.id
